feed.title: New difficulty algorithm needed for SegWit2x fork? (reformatted text)

entry.title: New difficulty algorithm needed for SegWit2x fork? (reformatted text)
entry.summary: Based on the provided context, it appears that the author has made a post and there have been no arguments against it. Therefore, they have decided to start working on a BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal). It is unclear what the original post was about or what the BIP will entail. The context also includes an attachment of an HTML file, but no information is given about its contents.
